reviews.review_text: The lining rolls when the slipper is put on. Also, it was a good idea for me to order a larger size so I could wear socks in the winter since the top snags on the top of my foot. Had I ordered my normal size I would not be able to get the slipper on.

don’t really mean to sound condescending but the box came like it went through WWII, other than that, shoes are comfortable and it is what the picture says it is. depending on ur shoe size, keep ur size on the order— since it’s true to size but it runs a tiny bit large

reviews.title: Get what you pay for!
reviews.review_text: Got the product on sale for Black Friday deals- wanted the “Pawz” brand but they weren’t on sale. The shoes are super light and not very sturdy. The back heel part isn’t high enough so I have to walk weird so the shoes don’t slip off since they are also fuzzy inside(which is fine)

reviews.title: Not cushiony and too stiff
reviews.review_text: They look great on the ad and in person, but they are too stiff, not pliable, and the bottom of the slipper is too flat, not at all cushiony. They do provide warmth to my feet and that is the reason I am keeping them.

reviews.title: Fall alert
reviews.review_text: The fit is fine except these shoes are a bit wide for my size medium shoe. I chose the black in 8/9 size. The soles are not slip proof or non slip even a little bit. Tho I tried to be careful when walking I did fall today while wearing these.

II wouldI would orderI would order aI would order a smallI would order a smallerI would order a smaller sizeI would order a sma i would order a smaller size they run a little large to me, but are comfortable except for my foot slipping inside of them i would order a smaller size they run a little large to me, but are comfortable except for my foot slipping inside of them

reviews.title: Found the exact same thing for less somewhere else
reviews.review_text: I was super excited when I saw these slippers for my daughter on sale pre-Black Friday. I thought the price seemed decent for what the photos showed. I placed my order and waited. Come to find out the product is not coming from a Walmart warehouse but in fact is coming from China directly. My package was delayed/delivered over a week later than originally stated. I waited until the week of Christmas to open the package and check out my purchase and man was I surprised. A few weeks back I had ordered what I thought were a similar pair of slipper for myself on T-E-M-U. They arrived and I opened them the same time I opened the Walmart set. I was beyond annoyed when my six dollar pair of slippers were the EXACT same size same as the set from Walmart that were three times as much. All of that being said, I will review the actual slippers themselves not the shady practices of the third party seller. The slippers are decently cute in person, not as nice looking as they were online. The bottom sole is very strange almost plastic. Would I knowingly purchase this same pair again? Probably not. I think I have had beater luck buying in store at Walmart or Sam’s Club and will go that route from now on.

reviews.title: Not worth $49.99 but cute sale item
reviews.review_text: These are cute and comfy but I felt obligated to leave a review after getting a “great deal” on Black Friday. I purchased for $16.99 regular price $49.99 and thought I got a great deal. They are cute but the quality is nowhere even close to being worth $50! These are fairly priced at $16.99 and I would never pay a penny more.

reviews.title: Nice but not suede
reviews.review_text: The actual slipper is fine. The lower rating comes from the pitch that they are suede. I assume that this material is a form of suede material but I was under the impression that they were made of genuine suede.

reviews.title: I like em, not what I was actually hoping for
reviews.review_text: So these are nothing like the name brand ones. I have the name brand ones. But not these are fluffy and comfy. I won't wear them out but house shoes for sure.

reviews.title: Keeping item, but ...
reviews.review_text: Yes, furry, warm, cushy, comfy, but the seam on the top down the middle is an inch off of center. So I'll keep these for yard shoes, but I'm ordering another pair from Amazon.

reviews.title: Cute but not exactly like pic
reviews.review_text: Comfy but definitely a little thicker than I would’ve liked and look like funny. But for the price I’m just gonna keep them and wear them around the house!
I take a 7 1/2 and my toe hits the top of the shoe little bulky for me

reviews.title: Cheaply Made
reviews.review_text: These are cheaply made and the soles are very bulky.

reviews.title: Indoor use only
reviews.review_text: Only for indoor. Bottoms are thin and cheap.
I thought they were a shoe. They are not. They are differently a slipper. The soles are rubber but soft

reviews.title: Comfy
reviews.review_text: The decorative threading came off of one pair after about 2 weeks. I still wear them, just not in public.

reviews.title: Cheaper looking than advertised
reviews.review_text: These are warm but the sole is cheap, and I can tell they're not going to last long. They're also not as cushioned as I expected.

reviews.title: Not an Ugg dupe
reviews.review_text: Not an Ugg dupe, very light weight but expected because it is a slipper. They are warm/soft but look big on your feet
